name: Securing Your Cloud Applications
description: This phase focuses on securing the cloud applications and infrastructure you've built throughout your journey. You'll take the Journal API application from previous phases and implement enterprise-grade security controls, monitoring, and incident response capabilities.
short_description: Implement cloud security: IAM policies, secrets management, network security, threat detection, and incident response. Enterprise-grade protection.

capstone.title: Comprehensive Security Implementation
capstone.summary: Harden your Journal API and cloud environment with practical, production-minded security controls.

hands_on_verification.summary: Demonstrate security hygiene with scanning and remediation evidence.

prerequisites: Completed Phase 5: DevOps Fundamentals (recommended but not required)
Access to the Journal API application and infrastructure from previous phases
A cloud platform account (AWS, Azure, or GCP) with administrative permissions

connections.description: Use your Linux, networking, and programming skills to configure security tools
Secure the cloud resources and networking you deployed
Add security scanning and monitoring to your CI/CD pipelines
Make everything production-ready with enterprise security controls

security_overviews.text: AWS Security Pillar - Well Architected Framework
